headline: Bitcoin: Navigating volatility and preparing for regulation changes
summary: Mizuho Securities managing director and senior analyst, fintech equity research Dan Dolev, The Benchmark Company equity research analyst, fintech and digital assets Mark Palmer, and Coinbase institutional head of strategy John D'Agostino, join Yahoo Finance Invest, detailing how they see bitcoin (BTC-USD) as an investment, the risks involved, and the chances it could fall to zero. For full interviews, highlights, and key insights, check out more from Yahoo Finance Invest.

For full interviews, highlights, and key insights, check out more from Yahoo Finance Invest.

headline: Bitcoin Slides Below $100k, Down 22% from All-Time High
summary: Crypto stocks mirrored the decline in bitcoin and tech stocks.  Crypto exchange Coinbase Global fell about 6.9%, while stablecoin company Circle Internet Group dropped about 4.6%.  Meanwhile, long-term holders of bitcoin have also added downward pressure on the token's price by selling a total of about 815,000 bitcoin in the past 30 days, the highest level since January 2024, according to data provider CryptoQuant.

raw.headline: Bitcoin Slides Below $100k, Down 22% from All-Time High
raw.summary: Crypto stocks mirrored the decline in bitcoin and tech stocks.  Crypto exchange Coinbase Global fell about 6.9%, while stablecoin company Circle Internet Group dropped about 4.6%.  Meanwhile, long-term holders of bitcoin have also added downward pressure on the token's price by selling a total of about 815,000 bitcoin in the past 30 days, the highest level since January 2024, according to data provider CryptoQuant.

headline: Bitcoin investing: Key risks investors need to know
summary: As bitcoin (BTC-USD) falls to its lowest level since April, John D'Agostino, Coinbase institutional head of strategy, joins Yahoo Finance Invest and explains the risks associated with investing in the cryptocurrency. Make sure to watch Yahoo Finance's interview with the full panel. For full interviews, highlights, and key insights, check out more from Yahoo Finance Invest.

headline: Bitcoin Sinks Deeper Below $100,000 as Bear Market Grips Crypto
summary: Once-reliable sources of support — including large investment funds, ETF allocators, and corporate treasuries — have stepped back, removing a key prop from this year’s rally and triggering a new phase of market fragility.  “Bitcoin was already under pressure from heavy spot selling and corporate-hedging activity, with traders avoiding alt coins almost entirely,” said Jake Ostrovskis, head of OTC trading at Wintermute.  The retreat comes amid renewed volatility across global markets.

raw.headline: Bitcoin Sinks Deeper Below $100,000 as Bear Market Grips Crypto
raw.summary: Once-reliable sources of support — including large investment funds, ETF allocators, and corporate treasuries — have stepped back, removing a key prop from this year’s rally and triggering a new phase of market fragility.  “Bitcoin was already under pressure from heavy spot selling and corporate-hedging activity, with traders avoiding alt coins almost entirely,” said Jake Ostrovskis, head of OTC trading at Wintermute.  The retreat comes amid renewed volatility across global markets.
